{{Description|A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.}}
'''Messenger'''{{Lang|zh=信使}} is a [[Liyue]] bow.

==Description==
It was said in days gone by,<br />
The people of Liyue passed messages by bow and arrow.<br />
"Wouldn't bystanders get hurt, you ask?"<br />
"Suffice to say, there's a good reason this bow is an antique..."<br />
The antique shop owner rubbed their chin and smiled.
